name: TV N1 plugin for Kodi/XBMC
tagline: Kodi plugin for TV N1 Info
body:
### About
This is [Kodi](http://www.kodi.tv) plugin for [N1-Info](http://n1info.com) regional tv station. 
N1-Info covers ex-Yu region (Serbia, Croatia and BiH).
The plugin allows you to watch live streams for any of three regions and some tv shows.

This isn't official plugin and I am not in any connection with TV N1.
I made it for my personal use, because my cable tv operator doesn't offer N1-Info channel.

### Downloads
[Current release information](https://github.com/zchira/plugin.video.n1exyu/releases/tag/0.4)
[Instalation Archive](https://github.com/zchira/plugin.video.n1exyu/releases/download/0.4/plugin.video.n1exyu.zip)

### How to install
Download installation archive, and install it from Kodi (Video->Add on->Install from Zip)
